title: Stories from Silver V
body:
So this thread is about the things you have seen in Silver V

I saw a person pick graves into a sona caitlin bot lane saying that cait is countered by graves post lvl 6. I saw a top laner misclick and instalock fiora against a maokai.  I saw a fizz go 26 and 2....  and their team lost.

I saw a hecarim get a solo quadra + baron steal

There are more stories like this.... I think Silver V is for people who are mostly bad players, but have moments of sheer brilliance, but like I said. mostly bad. Like me.
